{{Infobox Berry |name = #37 Passho |image = [[File:Passho.png]] |caption = This Berry's flesh is dotted with countless tiny bubbles of air that keep it afloat in water. This Berry promotes the fruiting of nearby Berry plants. |growtime =6h 0m 0s |harvest = 22 berries |replant = 5% |points = 1,300 |flavor =
*0 spicy *15 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} == Description == '''Passho''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Oran]], at least 1 [[Chesto]], at least 1 [[Kelpsy]] and at least 1 [[Coba]]. When a Passho berry is not surrounded by at least one other berrie, there is a chance is may mutate to a [[Yache]]. On obtaining your first Passho berry, plant a berry ([[Kasib]] is a good choice) around it to avoid it unintentionally mutating and then needing to reobtain it. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 8 mins 10 secs || 1 hour || 3 hours || 6 hours - 12 hours |- ! Animation |

8 hours || 48 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 2 hours 40 mins -
5 hours 20 mins || 32 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Passho berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
